ygData.subject: Sleeper?
ygData.msgSnippet: Rokenn, let me right off the bat say I ve always had great respect for you and the work you ve put into your bard and your site. My email is not intended as a
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn, let me right off the bat say I've always had great respect for you
and the work you've put into your bard and your site. My email is not
intended as a bash to you or your guild, but this thread has me concerned.

http://pub42.ezboard.com/fayonaerofrm6.showMessage?topicID=335.topic
http://www.lumthemad.net/news/2064.php

I think its cool that a guild would be attempting this, but if the warders
dont respawn, then to me, bites, and will have an impact on the entire
server community, not just ew, dw and vv but futur guilds that would like to
go to ST as well... Take Rathe for example, it supposedly has had no warder
spawn since the sleeper was awakened. :(

I might have my info wrong, I might not, either way I hope they dont go
away.

Minkin the worried
A Ro
